tweets.author: HALU
tweets.text:
Hey, mass media!

Are you okay in the head!?

The Defense Ministry has made it public, you know!

You'd understand if you just looked!

And stop needling us one by one!



Chinese and Russian bombers take an "unprecedented route" toward the Tokyo area in a joint flight...

thread_replies.author: あみあみ
thread_replies.text:
I get that it's been announced,  
but  
having 15 fighter and bomber aircraft combined from China and Russia  
fly this route is just unacceptable, right?

thread_replies.author: profile見てくれ
thread_replies.text:
Don't go or youll miss your chance to survive, not die out
共産党くそきつい
ベトナム社会主義を見習え
